definition: "roof" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 40), occurring in 家, 定, 安 etc/see also 寶蓋|宝盖[bao3 gai4]
to entertain (for dinner)/to invite to dinner

Feast at Hongmen/(fig.) banquet set up with the aim of murdering a guest/refers to a famous episode in 206 BC when future Han emperor Liu Bang 劉邦|刘邦[Liu2 Bang1] escaped attempted murder by his rival Xiang Yu 項羽|项羽[Xiang4 Yu3]

sentences.english: We usually have the celebration with feasts and firecrackers.
sentences.chinese: 我們通常以豐盛的閤家宴和鞭炮來慶祝新年。

sentences.english: Spring Banquet, a cup of green wine song again.
sentences.chinese: 春日宴，綠酒一杯歌一遍。

sentences.english: Agreements should be clearly expressed, and chocolate should be served thick.
sentences.chinese: 合約應以清楚爲佳，猶如巧克力應以濃相宴。

sentences.english: Then he gave orders to hold a dinner for Hua Tuo.
After the tour, a mini High Table at Loke Yew Hall was held at which a "lecture" was conducted.
sentences.chinese: 參觀完畢後，他們在陸佑堂參加迷你高桌宴。

sentences.english: Xin Guang is leading Crab feast food in Shanghai.
sentences.chinese: 新光是上海灘喫蟹宴的“龍頭老大”。

sentences.english: He had seen her home after the bean- feast.
sentences.chinese: 喫完解僱宴他送她回到了家門口。

sentences.english: I blew fifty dollars on the lobster dinner.
sentences.chinese: 爲這頓龍蝦宴我花去五十元。

sentences.english: Treats are great in moderation, but moderation is the key word.
sentences.chinese: 在現代化的宴饗都非常美味，但是現代化纔是根源。

sentences.english: Apricot Garden was also the place where the successful candidates of the imperial civil examination would give banquets to celebrate their success.
sentences.chinese: 杏園也是唐代新科進士舉行杏園探花宴的場所。

sentences.english: Fangliang Xieyan offers only private dining rooms for discriminating palates .
sentences.chinese: 芳良蟹宴依據不同的口味提供私人就餐場所。

sentences.english: Second, we are here to wish you more victories!
Its Western Park will be hosting a barbecue under the banner Bollox to the Royal Wedding.
sentences.chinese: 那裏的西區公園將會舉辦一次燒烤宴。

definition: to entertain (for dinner)/to invite to dinner
banquet where guests arrive at various times and are served with food as they arrive
